name: The Nest (itch) (BlueChronicle, Josh Marlowe, Zachary Fried)
name_original: The Nest (itch) (BlueChronicle, Josh Marlowe, Zachary Fried)
description:
Made in Unity during the Game Jam 2021.
Best played in full screen mode.

  • Programmer: Joshua Marlowe, LB Corney
  • Music & Audio: DaftSkunk, ad.azh.io
  • Designer: Keyan Hatefi
  • Art: Katelynn Taylor, Keyan Hatefi
  • Narrative: Zachary Fried
  • Concept: Everyone

-= Description =-
Welcome to The Nest! The year is 4090 and you are Lafayette Harrison, a futuristic collector-extraordinaire. You are sent by I.C.E.C.R.E.A.M. (International Coalition of Explorers Chasing the Reaches of Extreme Anterior Motion) to find three rare items on an abandoned space station called The Nest.

You arrive on the space station looking for a mint condition coin, a vintage cleaning tool, and a record player. Although, it seems the International Coalition was misinformed about what's REALLY on The Nest...

-= Controls =-
A/D or Left Arrow/Right Arrow Key to move
I to open your inventory
Left Click to interact with objects
